citeinfo.origin: Alaska Department of Fish and Game (ADF&G), Fisheries Rehabilitation Enhancement and Development (FRED)
citeinfo.title: Mariculture Permit Tracking

descript.abstract: Data Type: Fish ; The database tracks the status of mariculture permit applications in the department's permitting process, maintaining information on all mariculture ventures in the state. The GIS is a locational device derived as a visual by-product of the mariculture permit application and tracking process. Mariculture tracking is a joint project of the ADF&G and Department of Natural Resources.

idinfo.accconst: General location information is available upon request.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
